title.a: Knockdown - #TowneFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/05/2022 INC#0204

item.description: Knockdown - #TowneFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0204; 04:40AM; 784 S Crocker St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3smceWS; #Downtown; 112 Firefighters took just 72 minutes in well-coordinated offensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish an exterior rubbish fire that had upon their arrival extended within and soon heavily involved contents, including stacked storage inside one unit of a one story row of businesses. The fire was skillfully confined to the single textile firm, with the two immediately adjoining businesses spared from fire extension. No injuries were reported. The specific cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E2 E20 E201 E203 E209 E210 E227 E27 E52 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HE1 HR3 RA209 RA27 RA810 RA827 RA9 RA900 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14 15; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #TowneFire 02/05/2022 INC#0204

item.description: Update #TowneFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0204; 04:23AM; 784 S Crocker St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3smceWS; Downtown; With 112 LAFD personnel assigned in offensive firefighting operations against heavy fire, this incident has escalated to Greater Alarm status and if formally known as the Towne Fire.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E2 E20 E201 E203 E209 E210 E227 E27 E52 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA209 RA27 RA810 RA827 RA9 RA900 SQ21 T1 T10 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0204; 03:28AM; 784 S Crocker St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3smceWS; #Downtown; PRELIM: Outside rubbish fire extended into a one (textile?) business in a one-story row of commercial businesses.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E10 E17 E2 E203 E209 E210 E9 EM1 RA810 RA9 RA900 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1633; 09:51PM; 8803 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J0kQt0; #VermontVista; 46 Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a vehicle fire which had extended to two units of a seven unit one-story motel building, one of several buildings on premises. The fire was prevented from entering the attic, where only smoke was present. One civilian now being evaluated at scene for non-life threatening injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM22 E21 E233 E264 E266 E33 E64 E65 EM13 RA33 RA833 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1633; 09:32PM; 8803 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J0kQt0; #VermontVista; PRELIM: Vehicle fire has extended into one or more rooms and attic at a one-story motel.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 RA33 RA833 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0957; 02:17PM; 8416 N Cedros Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lbi31S; #PanoramaCity; 29 Firefighters took just 16 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in one well involved "third floor" apartment (later described as the top floor in a 60-unit 46,770 square-foot modern combination center-hallway and courtyard building of "3 occupied floors over parking"). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E298 E7 E88 EM10 RA81 RA881 RA90 T89 T98; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0516; 09:34AM; 20731 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ope1cJ; Woodland Hills; LAFD ground and air response to a critically injured 29 year-old male mountain bicyclist near a remote trail in rugged terrain south of Serrania Park. A hovering LAFD rescue helicopter lowered flight paramedics to medically assess and stabilize the patient, and have been joined by LAFD ground crews to carefully prepare the patient to be hoisted into the hovering helicopter for continued in-flight care during direct transport to a regional trauma center.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AO2 BC17 E290 E305 E72 E84 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA83 RH114 T105 T90; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey
